wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Tindale (29 March 1963 – 1 July 2017) was a British environmentalist who was the Executive Director of Greenpeace in the United Kingdom from 2000 to 2005. He was Director of The Alvin Weinberg Foundation, co-founder of the organisation Climate Answers, Associate Fellow at the Centre for European Reform and co-author of Repowering Communities with Prashant Vaze.
